bug.author: daniel156161
bug.description:
Describe the bug trying the new backup.sh some files are 0 Bytes and some will backup twice into the tar cv prozess To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
chmod +x backup.sh ./backup.sh extract 10.0.0.2-backup-1574124442.tgz looking at 10.0.0.2-backup-1574124442/root/handshakes/ all handshakes are 0 Bytes
Expected behavior a functional backup
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40464775/69107037-6e37ff80-0a70-11ea-9627-aedb23ac7c6c.png></denchmark-link>
Left old backupskript(My) Right new backupskript <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40464775/69107038-6ed09600-0a70-11ea-9dc8-bb2757c3738a.png></denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version: 1.3.0 Ubuntu 19.10 x64 eoan 5.3.0-23-generic
i import all backups into borgbackup sync with rclone to google drive here are the infos my skript working functional like the version before <denchmark-link:https://github.com/evilsocket/pwnagotchi/files/3861407/my_skripts.zip>my_skripts.zip</denchmark-link>
